en.dissociation: This will dissociate the floating IP from this resource.
en.tip_info_floatingip: The instance will not reachable via public network after dissociate.It still can be visited from public network via router's SNAT(Show More)
en.tip_no_port_instance: The instances with no port are excluded in the list
en.apply_ip_tip: Applying for floating IP will allocate a random IP address from IP resource pool.

zh-CN.dissociation: 公网IP与资源之间的关联将被解除。
zh-CN.tip_info_floatingip: 解除绑定之后云主机将不能通过公共网络使用,它仍然可以从公共网络通过路由器的SNAT访问
zh-CN.tip_no_port_instance: 没有网络端口的云主机不会显示在列表中
zh-CN.apply_ip_tip: 申请公网IP将会从IP资源池中随机分配一个IP地址。
